author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves accessing and reviewing external HTTP logs to gather information about web traffic, identify potential threats, and analyze user behavior. It is essential for understanding the context of web-based incidents and for proactive monitoring of web applications.

enrichment.title: Geolocation
enrichment.description: Enrich the IP address with geolocation data to understand the origin of the request.

enrichment.title: Threat Intelligence
enrichment.description: Integrate threat intelligence feeds to identify known malicious IP addresses or user agents.

enrichment.title: User Context
enrichment.description: Correlate the request with user profiles to understand user behavior and potential insider threats.

hunting.title: Anomalous Behavior Detection
hunting.description: Identify unusual patterns in HTTP requests, such as spikes in traffic from a specific IP address or unusual request methods.

hunting.title: Phishing Detection
hunting.description: Analyze URLs for signs of phishing attempts, such as suspicious domains or query parameters.

hunting.title: Data Exfiltration Monitoring
hunting.description: Monitor for large data transfers or unusual access patterns that may indicate data exfiltration attempts.

hunting.title: Malware Distribution
hunting.description: Identify requests that may be serving malware or malicious content based on known indicators of compromise (IOCs).

fields.title: HTTP Request Method
fields.description: The method used in the HTTP request (e.g., GET, POST, PUT, DELETE).

fields.title: URL
fields.description: The full URL of the request, including query parameters.

fields.title: Response Status Code
fields.description: The HTTP status code returned by the server (e.g., 200, 404, 500).

fields.title: User Agent
fields.description: Information about the client software making the request.

fields.title: Device Name
fields.description: The Device Name from which the web activity originated.

fields.title: Source User
fields.description: The user that initiated the web traffic.

fields.title: IP Address
fields.description: The IP address of the client making the request.

fields.title: Timestamp
fields.description: The date and time when the request was made.

title: Access External HTTP Logs
